trans-unit.source: Represents a single filter entry.
trans-unit.target: 表示單一篩選項目。

trans-unit.source: The filter is used to allow or exclude particular database objects during generation.
trans-unit.target: 此篩選是在產生期間用來允許或排除特定的資料庫物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEntry" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEntry" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The pattern to use to select the appropriate catalog.
trans-unit.target: 要用來選取適當目錄的模式。

trans-unit.source: The pattern to use to select the appropriate schema or null to not limit by schema.
trans-unit.target: 要用來選取適當結構描述的模式；如為 null 則不受結構描述的限制。

trans-unit.source: The pattern to use to select the appropriate name or null to not limit by name.
trans-unit.target: 要用來選取適當名稱的模式；如為 null 則不受名稱的限制。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEntry" /> class with the specified catalog, schema, and name filters.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的目錄、結構描述和名稱篩選初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEntry" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The pattern to use to select the appropriate catalog or null to not limit by catalog.
trans-unit.target: 要用來選取適當目錄的模式；如為 null 則不受目錄的限制。

trans-unit.source: The pattern to use to select the appropriate schema or null to not limit by schema.
trans-unit.target: 要用來選取適當結構描述的模式；如為 null 則不受結構描述的限制。

trans-unit.source: The pattern to use to select the appropriate name or null to not limit by name.
trans-unit.target: 要用來選取適當名稱的模式；如為 null 則不受名稱的限制。

trans-unit.source: The type of objects to apply this filter to.
trans-unit.target: 要將此篩選套用到的物件型別。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEffect" /> value indicating whether to allow or exclude entries that match the specified filters.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否要允許或排除符合所指定篩選條件之項目的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEffect" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEntry" /> class the specified catalog, schema, name, and type filters, and filter effect setting.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的目錄、結構描述、名稱和型別篩選初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEntry" /> 類別的新執行個體，並且篩選效果設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets the pattern that will be used to select the appropriate catalog.
trans-unit.target: 取得要用來選取適當目錄的模式。

trans-unit.source: The Catalog part of the database name where the database name is formatted as Catalog.Schema.Name.
trans-unit.target: 格式為「目錄.結構描述.名稱」之資料庫名稱的「目錄」部分。

trans-unit.source: Gets the effect that this filter has on results.
trans-unit.target: 取得此篩選對於結果的效果。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEffect" /> value that indicates whether to allow or exclude entries that match the specified filters.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEffect" /> 值，表示要允許或排除符合指定之篩選條件的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the pattern that will be used to select the appropriate name.
trans-unit.target: 取得要用來選取適當名稱的模式。

trans-unit.source: The Name part of the database name where the database name is formatted as Catalog.Schema.Name.
trans-unit.target: 格式為「目錄.結構描述.名稱」之資料庫名稱的「名稱」部分。

trans-unit.source: Gets the pattern that will be used to select the appropriate schema.
trans-unit.target: 取得要用來選取適當結構描述的模式。

trans-unit.source: The Schema part of the database name where the database name is formatted as Catalog.Schema.Name.
trans-unit.target: 格式為「目錄.結構描述.名稱」之資料庫名稱的「結構描述」部分。

trans-unit.source: Gets the types of objects that this filter applies to.
trans-unit.target: 取得此篩選套用的物件型別。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterObjectTypes" /> value indicating the types of objects to apply to the filter to.
trans-unit.target: 表示此篩選所要套用之物件型別的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterObjectTypes" /> 值。
